# CollisionCastQueryType.all

**Case**

Report all hits sorted in ascending order by distance from the cast origin.

## Declaration

```swift
case all
```

## Collision cast queries

- **CollisionCastQueryType.nearest**: Report the closest hit.
- **CollisionCastQueryType.any**: Report one hit.
title: CollisionCastQueryType.all
